sentence: Whitmer is facing a cavalcade of possible Republican challengers, including former Detroit Police Chief James Craig and conservative media personality Tudor Dixon, and her ability or inability to fend off her ultimate challenger will indicate how Democrats are able to rebut coronavirus-related criticism and compete in Rust Belt swing states like Michigan, Pennsylvania and Wisconsin.
author: Tal Axelrod
title: Eleven interesting races to watch in 2022

sentence: The two candidates James Craig, a former Detroit police chief, and Perry Johnson, a wealthy businessman were among five Republicans in the race who were declared ineligible.
title: Pennsylvania court sides with McCormick for now, ordering undated ballots to be counted.

sentence: Detroit's former police chief, James Craig, is in the same category.
title: 2 Michigan gubernatorial candidates lose final appeals and will remain off ballot after phony petition signatures
